meta.title: California Riparian Systems: Ecology, Conservation, and Productive Management
meta.creator: Richard E. Warner and Kathleen M. Hendrix, editors
meta.subject: Environmental Studies
California and the West
meta.description: This volume presents 135 of the papers presented at the 1981 California Riparian Systems Conference. The papers address all aspects of riparian systems: habitat, wildlife, land management, land use policy planning, conservation and water resource management.
